My name is Mingle Xu, a post-doctoral researcher with Core Research Institute of Intelligent Robots
in Jeonbuk National University, South Korea.

My passion is utilizing artificial intelligence and deep learning to mitigate the challenges in plant science, especially plant disease recognition.
Welcome any discussions and questions about them.

I support [slow science](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slow_science).
